description: HDFS Dashboard for Isilon based Hadoop clusters

panels.content: This table is crafted specifically for the use with Isilon HDFS.
panels.title: HDFS by Isilon
Active HDFS Connections per Node on $cluster

panels.content:
# L1 Cache
Or Level 1 cache is a client side cache that caches file objects as they are accessed on that particular node.
panels.title: L1 Cache

targets.query: SELECT max("l1_data_read_hit") /max("l1_data_read_start") FROM "node.ifs.cache" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT max("l1_meta_read_hit") /max("l1_meta_read_start") FROM "node.ifs.cache" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)

panels.content:
# L2 Cache
Level 2 cache is a back-end cache that caches file block that reside on that particular node.
panels.title: L2 Cache

targets.query: SELECT max("l2_data_read_hit") /max("l2_data_read_start") FROM "node.ifs.cache" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT max("l2_meta_read_hit") /max("l2_meta_read_start") FROM "node.ifs.cache" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)

panels.content:
# L3 Cache
Level 3 cache is an SSD backed cache that works with L2 Cache and contains blocks and metadata that are local to that particular node.
panels.title: L3 Cache

targets.query: SELECT max("l3_data_read_hit") /max("l3_data_read_start") FROM "node.ifs.cache" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT max("l3_meta_read_hit") /max("l3_meta_read_start") FROM "node.ifs.cache" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)

SELECT mean("l1_meta_read_hit")/ mean("l1_meta_read_start") FROM "node.ifs.cache" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND "node" =~ /^$node$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node", "cluster" fill(null)

SELECT mean("l2_meta_read_hit")/ mean("l2_meta_read_start") FROM "node.ifs.cache" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND "node" =~ /^$node$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node", "cluster" fill(null)

SELECT mean("l3_meta_read_hit")/ mean("l3_meta_read_start") FROM "node.ifs.cache" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND "node" =~ /^$node$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node", "cluster" fill(null)
SELECT mean("time_avg")  / 1000 FROM "cluster.protostats.$protocol" WHERE "cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "class_name",  "op_name" fill(null)

list.label: Node
list.name: node
list.query: show tag values with key = "node" where "cluster" =~ /^$cluster/

title: HDFS - Home (Isilon)
